name: GDKO Round 3 - Adventures of a blind man searching for key
name_original: GDKO Round 3 - Adventures of a blind man searching for key
description:
GDKO Round 3 - Adventures of a blind man searching for keyPress "1" to capture the mouse 

Ok, that was a tough one. So you are a blind man - in first person perspective. Yes, that's 3d game... Obviously you cannot see anything. Hovewer the game developer couldn't afford voiceovers and all of the audio design so cheated a little bit. There are some visual indicators.

What you have to do is to find a key and get out of the room. To do that you can walk (W, S, A, D), look around (Mouse) and interact with some of the objects (Right click/Space). Good luck!

Hints time! HUD pointer turns red if you are close to obstacle and green if you can interact with something.

Controls:
W,S,A,D - Movement
Right click/Space - Interact
1 - Capture/Release mouse pointer
